description: After Gihren, Dozle is the next oldest of Degwin Zabi`s surviving children. This scarred veteran is the commander of Zeon`s Space Attack Force, which is based at the asteroid fortress Solomon. Dozle is a born soldier, to whom nothing is more important than honor, duty, and the glory of battle. Despite his ferocious appearance, he`s a loyal family man, devoted to his younger brother Garma, his wife Zenna, and his infant daughter Mineva.
name: Dozle Zabi
